title: 尼古拉·路易索蒂指挥普朗克《荣耀经》、普罗科菲耶夫《第五交响曲》
short_description: ”既时尚新颖又通俗易懂“被许多二十世纪作曲家视为他们的黄金守则。在本场音乐会中， 指挥家尼古拉·路易索蒂为我们演绎了这一时期最具代表性的杰出作品：弗朗西斯·普朗克在深沉与开朗之间自由转换的《荣耀经》、谢尔盖·普罗科菲耶夫著名的《第五交响曲》等。除此之外，长笛演奏家艾曼纽·帕胡德还为我们演奏了克洛德·德彪西和卢奇亚诺·贝利奥的长笛作品。

interview.title: 尼古拉·路易索蒂对话艾曼纽·帕胡德
interview.description: Nicola Luisotti from Tuscany is equally distinguished both as an opera and concert conductor, whose career has included such significant posts as music director of San Francisco Opera and the Teatro di San Carlo in Naples. Luisotti has also conducted successful opera performances at La Scala Milan, the Metropolitan Opera in New York and the Bayerische Staatsoper. To mark the musician’s guest appearance in Berlin in the winter of 2011, he discusses his unusual programme – which features Francis Poulenc’s rarely heard spiritual work Gloria and Prokofiev’s famous Fifth Symphony – with Emmanuel Pahud, principal flute with the Berliner Philharmoniker.
interview.short_description: 在2011年的圣诞节前夕，尼古拉·路易索蒂指挥柏林爱乐乐团上演了普朗克与普罗科菲耶夫的作品。在这里，路易索蒂与乐团的长笛演奏员艾曼纽·帕胡德进行了一次对话。
